summary: Qatar is a small country in West Asia, located on a peninsula in the Arabian Peninsula. It shares a border with Saudi Arabia and is mostly surrounded by the Persian Gulf. Doha is the capital and home to most of its people. Qatar is a desert country with a hot climate. It has been ruled by the Al Thani family as a monarchy since the 19th century. The country gained independence from Britain in 1971. Today, Qatar is rich in natural resources like oil and gas, making it one of the wealthiest countries globally. It is also known for its media network, Al Jazeera.
title: Qatar
